content: Pretty sure I've seen something along those lines... Are group theorists around?
how could I forget such a snappy name!
A rather easier way of finding it would just be typing "Burnside's Lemma" in the search bar of VS Code...

You would think that any lemma findable in that way would be findable by typing "Burnside" into the Google site search in the documentation. I actually find that a bit confusing. The string "Burnside" occurs right there on the webpage, so why does the site search not pick it up?
The google site search often only shows results from old versions of the website and I don't know if we have a way to force google to reindex the site.
